all-in-one.Startup: The perfect choice for your new business. Extremely simple to use & get started with. Setup integrated Accounting, CRM and Payroll in minutes.
all-in-one.Essential: The most popular choice for SMBs and growing companies. Suitable for growing businesses that do more and need more.
all-in-one.Professional: The ideal choice for companies that need advanced features and custom reporting with powerful, off-the-shelf tools.

books.Startup: Ideal for startups. Send invoices, track bills and expenses, and generate financial statements. No knowledge of accounting needed.
books.Essential: Ideal for growing businesses and SMBs. Send more invoices, fulfill more orders, track more inventory. Do more with Deskera Books!
books.Professional: A powerful solution for advanced users! Setup Bill of Materials to track manufacturing costs. Use custom fields to track data and create reports.

sales.Startup: Ideal for startups. Add contacts, close deals, and build sales pipelines. All email conversations in one place. With inbuilt email marketing templates.
sales.Essential: Ideal for growing businesses and SMBs. Get the power of custom fields. Tag your contacts and deals with custom attributes for better reporting.
sales.Professional: For email marketing at scale. The Professional plan allows you to expand your contact list and the number of emails sent exponentially!

people.Startup: Ideal for startups. Automate payroll processing with Deskera People. Set up pay schedule, invite employees, and run payroll and send e-Payslips.
people.Essential: Ideal for growing businesses and SMBs. Run payroll for more employees. Setup your leave rules. Get better visibility into leaves and attendance.
people.Professional: Run payroll, track leave & attendance, and integrated expense reporting. Add up to 100 employees. Setup leave and expense reporting.
